AboutMeComponent.description: Hi, I'm a german speaking Frontend Developer leaving in Wuppertal . Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
AboutMeComponent.description2: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively both on-site in Wuppertal and remotely.
AboutMeComponent.description3: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
AboutMeComponent.description4: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code;  it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill  complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.

SkillsComponent.skills_description: I am proficient in a variety of programming languages and frameworks, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and more. My expertise extends to responsive design, ensuring that applications look great on all devices. I am also familiar with version control systems like Git, which allows for efficient collaboration and code management.
SkillsComponent.skills_description4: Reveal enthusiasm for learning new technologies and frameworks.

PortfolioComponent.portfolio_description: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

Pollo_Loco_Projects.title: Pollo Loco Game
Pollo_Loco_Projects.description: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

join_Projects.title: Join
join_Projects.description: Together with other training participants, I co-developed a web-based task management tool inspired by the Kanban system. Using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Firebase, we built a collaborative app with drag-and-drop functionality and task assignment by user and category. Git was used for version control and teamwork coordination.

ContactComponent.message_prompt: Feel free to drop me a message if you have any questions or just want to say hi!
ContactComponent.privacy_policy_agreement: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
ContactComponent.message_sent_success: Your message has been sent successfully!
ContactComponent.erorr-message_sent: Error sending message. Please try again.

PrivacyPolicyComponent.privacy_policy_description: This privacy policy informs you about the nature, scope, and purpose of the processing of personal data within my online offering.
PrivacyPolicyComponent.collected_data_content: When visiting this website, no personal data is automatically collected. No cookies are set, and no tracking takes place.
PrivacyPolicyComponent.contact_form_content:
If you contact me via the contact form, the following data will be processed:
– Name
– Email address
– Your message

This data is used exclusively to process your request and will not be shared with third parties.
PrivacyPolicyComponent.legal_basis_content: The processing of your data is carried out in accordance with Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR (for the fulfillment of a contract or pre-contractual measures).
PrivacyPolicyComponent.hosting_content: This website is hosted by Hetzner Online GmbH. The servers are located in Germany. Hetzner processes personal data only according to our instructions and within the framework of a data processing agreement in accordance with Art. 28 GDPR.
PrivacyPolicyComponent.github_links_content: This website contains links to my GitHub profile. When you click on a GitHub link, you will be redirected to the GitHub platform (GitHub Inc., USA). No data is transferred from your side to GitHub through my website.
PrivacyPolicyComponent.your_rights_list_1: to access the stored personal data (Art. 15 GDPR),
PrivacyPolicyComponent.your_rights_list_2: to rectification of inaccurate data (Art. 16 GDPR),
PrivacyPolicyComponent.your_rights_list_6: to object to the processing (Art. 21 GDPR).
PrivacyPolicyComponent.complaint_right_content: You have the right to lodge a complaint with the competent supervisory authority if you believe that the processing of your personal data violates the GDPR.
PrivacyPolicyComponent.privacy_policy_changes_content: I reserve the right to amend this privacy policy in the event of changes to the website or legal requirements. Please check regularly for the current status.

LegalNoticeComponent.provider_information_content:

LegalNoticeComponent.liability_content_1: The contents of this website were created with the utmost care. However, I cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or up-to-dateness of the contents.
LegalNoticeComponent.liability_content_2: This website contains links to external third-party websites (e.g., GitHub), on whose content I have no influence. Therefore, I cannot assume any liability for these external contents. The respective provider or operator of the linked pages is always responsible for their content.
LegalNoticeComponent.copyright_content: The content and works created by me on this website are subject to German copyright law. Contributions by third parties are marked as such. The duplication, editing, distribution, and any kind of use outside the limits of copyright law require my written consent.
